name: Sole Survivor
description:
One Button

One Arrow

One Life

The zombie apocalypse has ravished the Earth, and you are the last surviving human.  Unfortunately, you can't seem to perform more than one task at a time, and you only have one arrow to use with your crossbow.  It will take quick reflexes and clever planning to survive this exciting zombie shooter.

Controls:

Hold space when the desired action is active.  Actions will automatically switch at random, giving you a variety of options for the situation.  Once you have fired your arrow, you will have to retrieve it before shooting will be available again in the action cycle.

Music Credits:

"BGM Action 4" by RevampedPRO

"A Journey Awaits" by Pierre Bondoerffer (@pbondoer)

"Fight Them Until We Can't" by Zander Noriega

This game was made for GMTK Game Jam 2019
